episodes.name: One Piece: Defeat the Pirate Ganzack! (OVA 1)
episodes.overview: One day, when Luffy, Zoro, and Nami were starving on their little boat, they are attacked by a long-neck dragon. The dragon wrecks the boat when Luffy bites into it, then takes Nami back with it. Meanwhile, Luffy and Zoro wash up on the shores of an island where Ganzack is using the island's inhabitants as slave labor to complete his base and ship. There, the two boys meet a girl named Medaka. Together with the girl, they infiltrate Ganzack's base..

episodes.name: One Piece: The Movie
episodes.overview: There once was a pirate named Woonan. He was known as the Great Gold Pirate, who obtained almost a third of the world's gold. Over the course of a few years, that pirate's existence faded and a legend grew, that he disappeared with his gold to a remote island, an island pirates continue to search for. Aboard the Going Merry, Luffy, and his crew, starved and reckless, are robbed of their treasure. In an attempt to get it back Luffy wrecks the getaway ship, freeing a young boy named Tobio, who was a captive of El Drago's pirate crew. El Drago's love for gold has driven him to look for Woonan's island and thanks to Woonan's treasure map, he finds it. Meanwhile Luffy's crew split up and despite their own circumstances, they must find a way to stop El Drago from obtaining Woonan's gold.

episodes.name: Adventure in the Ocean's Navel
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats encounter a city in the middle of a whirlpool, called the Ocean's Naval, that is being destroyed by giant monsters. These monsters supposedly protect a treasure capable of granting wishes, but in the process of defeating these guardians, the crew ends up releasing another evil.

episodes.name: Clockwork Island Adventure
episodes.overview: Their ship is stolen and Luffy’s crew is adrift for over a week, leaving plenty of time to lament the loss. They come across a thief duo that claims it was stolen by the Trump Pirates, who have taken over Clockwork Island. To make things even worse, Nami is kidnaped. Now, the gang must travel to Clockwork Island to, not only reclaim their vessel, but also to potentially find the world famous treasure, the Diamond Clock, and to save Nami, before she has to marry the Trump Pirates' leader.

episodes.name: Jango's Dance Carnival
episodes.overview: A short released with Clockwork Island Adventure.  Jango hypnotizes the Straw Hats and the rest of Mirrorball Island to dance the night away!

episodes.name: Chopper's Kingdom on the Island of Strange Animals
episodes.overview: The crew searches for the Crowning Treasure, but as they approach the island it is said to be on, they are sent into the air, separating Chopper from the group. On the island, the animals and Mobambi, a young boy living among them, declare Chopper their king. The remaining Straw Hats, searching for him, encounter the treasure hunter Butler and his henchmen. After escaping from his hoard of Horn Eaters, an armored kind of animal, the size of a cow, they succeed in finding Chopper. But when Butler notices the reindeer to be the new animal king he summons his Horn Eaters after him and the fighting starts. In an attempt to save Chopper, Mobambi loses the Crowning Treasure to Butler. Strengthened by its power, he now poses a significant threat to the Straw Hats and every animal on the island.

episodes.name: Soccer King of Dreams
episodes.overview: A short released with Chopper's Kingdom.  The Straw Hats have a kick off contest against their rivals to become the soccer king!

episodes.name: Dead End Adventure
episodes.overview: In order to gain money, the crew enters the Dead End Race, a dangerous anything goes sailing competition. On the starting island of the race the crew is introduced to that year's favorite, General Gasparde, a former navy general who deserted after killing his men. The race proceeds and after lots of fighting and Gasparde's treachery, it all comes down to him and Luffy, one on one.

episodes.name: Open Upon the Great Sea! A Father's Huge, HUGE Dream!
episodes.overview: The crew comes across three children and two adults, posing as a family. As it turns out, the oldest child knows the location of a great treasure discovered by her late father, and they are on the run from a pirate with a dangerous ability.

episodes.name: Protect! The Last Great Performance
episodes.overview: Long-time actor Randolph is performing his final farewell show. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to buy tickets to go see the performance. 30 minutes before the play is set to start, 3 actors decide to quit the play, leaving Randolph's play shorthanded. Nami makes a deal with the manager of the play to participate as the princess for 100,000 Beli, and the other Straw Hats decide to help as well.

episodes.name: Curse of the Sacred Sword
episodes.overview: As the crew searches for Zoro, Sanji follows Maya, a girl of the island, to a village. There, Zoro appears, accompanied by a group of marines. Zoro wields his sword against Sanji and takes three jewel balls from Maya. Luffy stumbles upon a training center of the local navy division. There, he encounters Saga, the leader of the center and owner of the Seven Star Sword, who made Zoro take the balls to revive that swords slumbering power. Luffy fights him, but falls from a cliff. The Seven Stars Sword was that, which had ruined the country of Asuka with its cursed power a long time ago and had therefore been sealed. But with a night of a red full moon, that occurs only once every hundred years, the jewel balls in his possession, and Zoro on his side, only the remaining Straw Hats stand in Saga's way to reviving the swords true power.

episodes.name: Baseball King
episodes.overview: A short released with Curse of the Sacred Sword.  The Straw Hats play baseball against Arlong's pirate crew to see who will become King of Pirate Baseball!

episodes.name: Baron Omatsuri and the Secret Island
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats visit a recreational island, run by Baron Omatsuri, the former captain of a pirate crew, who were all killed years ago. Being the only survivor, he then started hating all close-knit groups of pirates and wishing to separate them. He and his henchmen seed distrust among the Straw Hats and capture them one by one, leaving only Luffy to free his crew from the Baron's hold.

episodes.name: The Detective Memoirs of Chief Straw Hat Luffy
episodes.overview: In an alternate reality world that takes place in 19th century Japan, Luffy acts as a member of the secret police. This is made up of two adventures. In the first, Buggy makes trouble in the town. In the second, a mysterious girl named Vivi appears. This special contains several cameos from characters throughout the entire series.

episodes.name: The Giant Mechanical Soldier of Karakuri Castle
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats visits an island, known as Mecha Island, where a fisherman sings an old folk song about a Golden Crown. Searching for that mysterious treasure, they find a hidden entrance into the island. The island's leader, Ratchet, impressed with the find and in search of the Golden Crown himself, invites the crew to join him in his search and the crew along with Ratchet and his henchmen enter the cave. As it turns out, the islands true form, is that of a giant turtle. Ratchet, who had known this all along, uses his mechanical castle to take control of the turtle, in order to use it, to take over the world. Now the Straw Hats have to stop not only Ratchet, but also the helpless turtle, from crashing into a nearby island.

episodes.name: Episode of Arabasta: The Desert Princess and the Pirates
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats travel to Alabasta, the desert island and home of Neferati Vivi. They find the country in the middle of a revolution. Sir Crocodile, the country's hero, secretly used his criminal organization, Baroque Works, to undermine the citizens trust in Cobra, Vivi's father and head of the Kingdom of Sand, in order to seize the throne and the countries hidden secret for himself. The crew now has to cross the desert, stop the revolution, save thousands of lives from Baroque Works hidden bombers, and most of all, defeat Crocodile, the mighty Shichibukai.

episodes.name: Episode of Chopper: Bloom in the Winter, Miracle Sakura
episodes.overview: Alternate-telling of how Straw Hat Crew got Tony Tony Chopper to join their crew.  It features Franky, Nico Robin, and the Thousand Sunny, who weren't present in the original version.

episodes.name: Romance Dawn Story (OVA 2)
episodes.overview:
The Romance Dawn anime remake retells the story of Romance Dawn V.1. This remake occurs after the Thriller Bark Arc and before the Sabaody Archipelago arc in the anime series. As such, all 9 members of the Straw Hat crew are present, as oppose to the original story, which only featured Luffy.

The Straw Hat Pirates run out of food stocks, and Luffy was sent out on the Mini-Merry, only to get lost and drift off course. Luffy arrives at an island to venture out in search of replenishing their provisions. He encounters a girl named Silk, who has mistaken Luffy as a pirate from Crescent-Moon Galley's crew. Galley, who was tied up on his ship by Luffy, has threatened her town and Luffy promises Silk that he'll help her defeat him. After a short fight, Luffy makes short work of the Crescent-Moon Galley, while explaining to Silk about his abilities. After Galley runs off, Luffy remembers he left the Mini-Merry tied to Galley's ship. On his way back, the Mayor and various townspeople, mistake Luffy for Galley. They proceed to subdue him and tie him up. As he tries to explain himself, Galley interferes and attacks Silk. Galley, Silk and Luffy trade words about the meaning of treasure. Galley proceeds to throw Luffy's straw hat into the nearby ocean. Luffy stretches to get, with his head extending, but falls short and into the water. Silk dives in, rescues him, and curses Galley for sailing away. As they leave, Galley orders an attack on the island, destroying several buildings. Luffy slingshots himself towards Galley's ship, only to by shot out of the air by a cannon ball.

Falling towards the water, Luffy is saved the Thousand Sunny and the other Straw Hats. Usopp, Sanji, Nami & Zoro berate Luffy on his being lost, while a fight breaks out on Galley's ship. After some fighting, Galley is given a wanted poster of Luffy, comparing Luffy's 300,000,000 Beli to his small 5,000,000. Luffy proceeds to wreck Galley's ship with his Gear 3rd, Giganto Ax (oddly he doesn't shrink a

episodes.name: Strong World
episodes.overview: East Blue in crisis? The news hits the Straw Hat crew  along their journey. With their hometowns facing a pinch, Luffy and his friends put their adventures on hold and decide to head back to East Blue, when suddenly a mysterious flying pirate ship appears out of the sky.

episodes.name: Strong World Episode 0
episodes.overview: One Piece Film Strong World Episode:0 is the animated version of chapter 0.

episodes.name: One Piece 3D: Mugiwara Chase
episodes.overview: According to Weekly Shonen Jump, 3D movies of One Piece and Toriko was announced to premiered on March 19th, 2011. One Piece 3D is an original story about missing straw hat of Luffy.

episodes.name: One Piece 3D: Gekisō! Trap Coaster
episodes.overview: Luffy continues his voyage with the Straw Hat Pirates in hopes of becoming the Pirate King. That is until he crosses paths with one of the Marine’s most intelligent captains, Captain Trap. Determined to capture Luffy, the captain attacks the Thousand Sunny with various traps he created. His intention is to make Luffy his right hand man.

episodes.name: Episode of Nami: the Navigator's Tears and the Companions' Bonds
episodes.overview: Episode of Nami: Tears of a Navigator and the Bonds of Nakama is a TV Special of the One Piece anime. It aired after Episode 560.  It is an abridged retelling of the Arlong Arc.

episodes.name: Episode of Luffy: The Hand Island Adventure
episodes.overview: The story of the Hand Island no Bouken special is set a little before the events of One Piece Film Z and depicts a major "Hand Island" incident during the New World storyline. The story is set at "Cannon Town" where a parent and a child work as craftspeople. The incident revolves around them and a commodore of a marine base. The special will also have a flashback scene to the story in the first chapter of the manga, but with new animation.

episodes.name: Glorious Island
episodes.overview: An exclusive anime prologue to One Piece Film Z with an original story penned by manga creator Eiichiro Oda.

episodes.name: One Piece Film Z
episodes.overview: The story will be about the first battle in The New World arc and will be said to include the "Strawhats' Greatest Enemy Yet."

episodes.name: Contingency Plan. Complete Summary One Piece (Episode 5.5)
episodes.overview: This is the first recapitulation episode, covering the first five episodes with only the difference being that the episode follows the manga storyline and begins with Luffy and Shanks at the bar. Also, in the ending, the current Straw Hats have a small conversation about their goals.

episodes.name: Episode of Merry: The Tale of One More Friend
episodes.overview:
On a test-run of the Mini Merry, Usopp tells Brook the story of the Going Merry, a ship that served the crew well. However, to the Straw Hats, the Going Merry was not just a ship: It was a priceless, irreplaceable friend.

*Scenes have been recreated with brand-new animation.

episodes.name: One Piece “3D2Y” Overcoming Ace’s Death! The Oath with Luffy’s Crewmates!
episodes.overview: The special takes place during the two year before the Straw Hats reunite on Sabody. Luffy is currently in Rusukaina training to get stronger to take on the New World. However the training is interrupted when Hancock's sisters, Marigold and Sandersonia, are kidnapped by the Byrnndi World, a pirate who was locked away on Level 6 of Impel Down but escaped during Luffy's invasion to save Ace, in order to lure Hancock to him and use her as a hostage against the World Government due to her Shichibukai status. Thus Luffy and Hancock head off to confront him and save Hancock's sisters.

episodes.name: One Piece: Episode of Sabo
episodes.overview: Sabo's mission to Dressrosa is explored as he aims to get Ace's Mera Mera no Mi.

episodes.name: One Piece Recap
episodes.overview: Recap summarizing the ten-year series to the Impel Down arc.

episodes.name: Adventure of Nebulandia
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats fight Foxy again in Nebulandia.

episodes.name: One Piece : Film Gold
episodes.overview: In their quest for One Piece, the Straw Hat crew arrives in Grantesoro, the entertainment capital of the world, where wealthy men come to gamble in the casino and watch the grandest shows. Grantesoro is an impregnable sanctuary controlled by the Emperor of Gold, Gild Tesoro. Even the Navy cannot intervene there. But Luffy and his companions will quickly discover the frightening hidden side of this city and will have to risk their lives to try to escape.

episodes.name: One Piece: Heart of Gold
episodes.overview: Television special that served as a prequel to the theatrical film One Piece Film: Gold.

episodes.name: One Piece Film: Gold Episode 0
episodes.overview: The Straw Hat Pirates are taking on Gild Tesoro, one of the richest men in the world.

episodes.name: Episode of East Blue: Luffy and His Four Crewmates' Great Adventure
episodes.overview: This is an abridged retelling of the first five Straw Hat Pirates' development during East Blue Saga. As the Straw Hat Pirates prepare to leave East Blue and enter the Grand Line, each of them reminisces about their journey to that point as they reaffirm their dreams.

episodes.name: Episode of Skypeia
episodes.overview: The special will be the first in the "Episode of" series to cover the Skypeia arc, and will feature a character who did not appear in the original Skypeia arc from the anime.

episodes.name: One Piece: Stampede Special
episodes.overview: The enemy that those gathered power face is "the worst escapee in all history!!" The CP-0, Seven Warlords of the Sea, Pirates (specifically Luffy and Law), Navy (specifically Smoker), and the Revolutionaries will all be featured. Douglas Bullet used to be a young hero as a soldier, but a certain incident caused him to retire. After an encounter with Roger and sailing on his ship he was more careful with his life, but after Roger's death, his path changed...

episodes.name: Dream 9 Toriko & One Piece & Dragon Ball Z Chō Collaboration Special!! (2/2)
episodes.overview: Featured characters of One Piece, Toriko and Dragon Ball enter the IGO tournament in order to gain the Carat meat, which is said to be the most tasteful in the world. However, it leads in a tie between Goku, Toriko and Luffy. Meanwhile, Zoro, Zebra and Vegeta meet accidently in a remote part of the race, and start fighting.

episodes.name: Special Episode: Barto's Secret Room
episodes.overview: Bartolomeo welcomes the guest Otama to find out about all the adventures lived by his beloved Luffy in the Wano Country arc!

episodes.name: A Special Episode to Admire Zoro-senpai and Sanji-senpai! Barto's Secret Room 2!
episodes.overview: Bartolomeo and Law look back on Luffy and the Straw Hats’ adventures in the Land of Wano, featuring Zoro and Sanji. Law tells Bartolomeo how Zoro and Sanji thrived during the events leading up to the great battle with Kaido.

episodes.name: A Comprehensive Anatomy! The Legend of Kozuki Oden!
episodes.overview: Yamato and Momonosuke look back on Oden’s adventures and heroic actions throughout the world and in the Land of Wano. Yamato describes for Momonosuke all the joy and pain that his father went through during his days.

episodes.name: The Captain's Log of the Legend! Red-Haired Shanks!
episodes.overview: As the world anticipates the legendary diva Uta’s show in Elegia, the Red-Hair Pirates are making some disturbing moves. Koby remembers how Shanks ended the Paramount War at Marineford.

episodes.name: A Comprehensive Anatomy! Fierce Fight! The Five from the New Generation!
episodes.overview: Description: Captain Kid and Killer look back on their adventures in the Land of Wano along with the other pirates from the Worst Generation, Luffy, Zoro, and Law. They describe how hard the five of them fought against the Emperors of the Sea, Kaido and Big Mom.

episodes.name: Recapping Fierce Fights! Straw Hats vs. Tobi Roppo
episodes.overview: Zoro and Sanji look back on their friends’ battles against the Tobi Roppo, the top officers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates. They describe how hard Nami, Robin, and the others fought to defeat the formidable enemies.

episodes.name: One Piece Film: Red
episodes.overview:
An almighty voice. With fiery red locks. 4th movie of "one piece film" series.
In this movie, the Straw Hats will participate in a “Music Festival” on a certain island!?

episodes.name: Recapping Fierce Fights! Zoro vs. A Lead Performer!
episodes.overview: Chopper and Sanji look back on Zoro’s battle against King the Wildfire, a Lead Performer of the Animal Kingdom Pirates. They explain how Zoro struggles to find a way to defeat the seemingly invincible King.

episodes.name: Recapping Fierce Fights! The Countercharge Alliance vs. Big Mom
episodes.overview: Nami and Robin look back on Law and Kid’s battle against Big Mom, one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. They explain how the two captains suffered, were driven to the wall, and fought back against the mighty Big Mom.

episodes.name: Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto's Secret Room 3!
Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto's Secret Room 4!
episodes.overview: Bartolomeo and O-Tama recap the events of Gear 5 Luffy battling Kaidou to Luffy finally defeating Kaidou.

episodes.name: Special Feature! Momonosuke's Path to Becoming a Great Shogun
episodes.overview: Momonosuke, Kin’emon, and Yamato look back on the Land of Wano after Kaido and Orochi were taken down. They talk about the things that happened in the country after the raid on Onigashima and how Momonosuke worked hard to become a great Shogun.

episodes.name: A Project to Fully Enjoy! 'Surgeon of Death' Trafalgar Law
episodes.overview: Chopper and Bepo look back on Trafalgar Law's life. They explain how he met Luffy, formed an alliance, and traveled to Punk Hazard, Dressrosa, and the Land of Wano to take down the Emperors of the Sea.

episodes.name: Log of Rivalry! The Straw Hats and Cipher Pol
episodes.overview: Franky and Robin give a recap of their history with Cipher Pol, with both their encounter with CP9 two years ago, as well as the actions of Lucci's group after they joined CP0.

episodes.name: Making History! The Turbulent Old and New Four Emperors!
episodes.overview: Zoro and Brook summarize the Four Emperors, beginning with the three original Emperors that have since been dethroned.

episodes.name: The Log of Turbulent Revolution - The Revolutionary Army Maneuvers in Secret!
episodes.overview: Bartolomeo and Cavendish introduce the Revolutionary Army. They talk about their key members, their relationship with Luffy and his crew, and how they have been working behind the scenes to overthrow the World Government.

episodes.name: Unwavering Justice! The Navy's Proud Log!
episodes.overview: Nami, Usopp, and Jinbe review the Navy. They introduce everything about the Navy’s prominent officers and soldiers from their special abilities to their conflicts, friendships, and memorable moments.

episodes.name: One Piece Fan Letter
episodes.overview: Two years after the Paramount War, the Straw Hats are about to reunite on the Sabaody Archipelago. At the same time, a girl who is head over heels for Nami is trying to hand a fan letter to her before the group leaves the island.

episodes.name: One Piece Egghead Arc Recap
episodes.overview: A special edited version which looks back on the episodes 1089-1122 that were broadcast from January to October 2024.

episodes.name: Dr. Chopper's Adventure Checkup - The Ballad of a Father and Daughter
episodes.overview: Chopper and Carrot review the history of Bartholomew Kuma and Bonney. They talk about how they were involved with the Straw Hats in the past, the special bond between them, and the commotion they are now creating at Mary Geoise and Egghead.

episodes.name: Dr. Chopper's Adventure Checkup - Good Friends at a Crossroad
episodes.overview: Chopper and Carrot review the history of Kizaru, Sentomaru, and Vegapunk. They talk about how good friends the three of them once were, how they came to be at odds due to their individual circumstances, and the fierce fight they got into at Egghead.

episodes.name: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!
episodes.overview: Alvida pirates plunder a ship only to find a barrel containing a strange boy names Luffy who is on a quest to find the legendary One Piece and become the King of Pirates.

episodes.name: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his new companion Coby set sail in search of the infamous pirate hunter Zoro, rumored to be held captive at the Marine Base.

episodes.name: Morgan versus Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?
episodes.overview: Luffy is in the line of fire after saving Zoro, and now tyrannical Captain Morgan is out for their heads! Zoro must decide if he will join forces with Luffy or die in captivity.

episodes.name: Luffy's Past! Enter Red-Haired Shanks!
episodes.overview: Luffy recalls a time when Captain Red-Haired Shanks taught him a valuable lesson in friendship and set him on his quest to be King of the Pirates.

episodes.name: A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!
episodes.overview: Luffy crosses paths with the clever thief Nami. A navigator on a quest to collect one hundred million berries, she’s perfect for Luffy’s new crew – except for the fact that Nami hates pirates.

episodes.name: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji Vs. Luffy!
episodes.overview: Having delivered a deadly blow to Captain Buggy’s pirates, Luffy and his companions need a place to recuperate. But the three are not in hiding very long before the Beast Tamer Mohji seeks them out.

episodes.name: Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro Vs. Acrobat Cabaji!
episodes.overview: In the ongoing fight with Captain Buggy's pirates, Zoro must face off with the Acrobat Cabaji while Luffy continues to do battle with the Pirate Clown himself.

episodes.name: Who Is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!
episodes.overview: Luffy and the gang are on the run after the battle with Captain Buggy! With no place to go and nothing else to do, Nami finally agrees to join Luffy on his quest.

episodes.name: The Honorable Liar? Captain Usopp!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami arrive at an island hoping to obtain a ship and crew, but the three are quickly confronted with the blustering Captain Usopp - who has a connection to Luffy's past.

episodes.name: The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!
episodes.overview: Luffy follows Usopp to the mansion and encounters the brutal pirate Captain Kuro. The scoundrel plans to claim Kaya's fortune and live the stolen life of luxury.

episodes.name: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!
episodes.overview: Usopp spreads word of Kuro's evil plot and the impending pirate attack, but no one believes his warnings. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to help Usopp put a stop to the dastardly scheme.

episodes.name: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!
episodes.overview: Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but they've prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone.

episodes.name: The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!
episodes.overview: In an effort to save Usopp's village, the Straw Hat Pirates seek to block the marauders' path from the sea. With Luffy out of the battle, Zoro must face the fearsome Meowban Brothers!

episodes.name: Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!
episodes.overview: Nami manages to rescue Zoro's missing swords and attempts to revive Luffy. With one of the Meowban brothers down, the other rages on even more fiercely than before!

episodes.name: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!
episodes.overview: Usopp's friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro.

episodes.name: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!
episodes.overview: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist.

episodes.name: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!
episodes.overview: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates' efforts to save her with a ship to call their own - the Going Merry!

episodes.name: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!
episodes.overview: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon.

episodes.name: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!
episodes.overview: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the world's greatest swordsman - but tragedy intervened.

episodes.name: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji.

episodes.name: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!
episodes.overview: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merry's found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew!

episodes.name: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!
episodes.overview: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.

episodes.name: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!
episodes.overview: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!

episodes.name: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls at Sea!
episodes.overview: The Going Merry's been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the action's not dead in the water - Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!

episodes.name: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji Vs. the Invincible Pearl!
episodes.overview: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Krieg's pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things aren't looking too good!

episodes.name: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! the Illusory All Blue!
episodes.overview: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.

episodes.name: Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!
episodes.overview: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.

episodes.name: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy Vs. Krieg!
episodes.overview: The scoundrel Don Krieg appears to have the upper hand in his fight with Luffy. To avoid walking the plank, the rubber man must try a different strategy.

episodes.name: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!
episodes.overview: The standoff between Luffy and Don Krieg takes a turn in favor of the Straw Hats when their captain focuses his onslaught on his opponent's weaponry.

episodes.name: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets Off With Luffy!
episodes.overview: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.

episodes.name: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!
episodes.overview: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami - who's on a collision course with a deadly foe!

episodes.name: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!
episodes.overview: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.

episodes.name: Usopp Dead?! When Is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!
episodes.overview: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.

episodes.name: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!
episodes.overview: A fierce argument over where Nami's loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one thing's for sure - no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.

episodes.name: Untold Past! Female Warrior Bellemere!
episodes.overview: Nami's adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmaker's younger days.

episodes.name: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!
episodes.overview: Nojiko continues the story of Nami's younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.

episodes.name: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!
episodes.overview: Nezumi comes to confiscate Nami's treasure, but who's he working for? More importantly, who's Nami working for, and what's she gonna do with her booty?

episodes.name: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fishmen Vs. the Luffy Pirates!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats' faith in Nami is restored, and now it's time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.

episodes.name: Luffy Submerged! Zoro Vs. Hatchan the Octopus!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats and Arlong's fishmen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.

episodes.name: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!
episodes.overview: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.

episodes.name: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!
episodes.overview: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant fishman.

episodes.name: Explosion! Fishman Arlong's Fierce Assault from the Sea!
episodes.overview: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami - and it makes his blood boil?

episodes.name: End of the Fishman Empire! Nami's My Friend!
episodes.overview: Something about Nami's former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. He's so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!

episodes.name: Setting Out With a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!
episodes.overview: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.

episodes.name: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes Known to the World!
episodes.overview: Finally, the day has arrived where Luffy's face is on an authentic wanted poster! Now there are enemies in hot pursuit as the crew makes waves for Logue Town - final resting place of Gold Roger!

episodes.name: Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure!
episodes.overview: Buggy gets marooned on an island inhabited by unusual creatures and tangles with the island's caretaker, Gaimon. If he is to finally destroy Luffy, Buggy must cast his lot with a mysterious woman.

episodes.name: The Wait Is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!
episodes.overview: The Buggy Pirates fight each other for the right to take their lost captain's place. While they're busy beating each other's brains out, a cannibalistic tribe makes plans to have something special for dinner.

episodes.name: The Town of the Beginning and the End! Landfall at Logue Town!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats arrive at Logue Town, and each crewmember embarks upon a mission of a more personal nature. While his crew shops, Luffy goes in search of sacred ground.

episodes.name: Kitetsu III and Yubashiri! Zoro's New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major!
episodes.overview: Luffy has a run-in with Captain Smoker, and his failure to keep a low profile helps Buggy draw a bead on him. Elsewhere, Zoro takes a chance that his skill can overcome a dangerous curse.

episodes.name: Usopp Vs. Daddy the Parent! Showdown at High!
episodes.overview: Usopp finds an amazing pair of sharpshooter's goggles, but they lead to a run in with Daddy the Parent - the greatest gunslinger ever! Now, the Straw Hat marksman is headed for the deadliest of all duels.

episodes.name: Fiery Cooking Battle? Sanji Vs. the Beautiful Chef!
episodes.overview: A cooking competition with the fiery chef Carmen rekindles Sanji's dreams of the legendary All Blue.

episodes.name: Buggy's Revenge! The Man Who Smiles On the Execution Platform!
episodes.overview: Buggy and his mysterious female ally trap Luffy on the same platform where Gold Roger was executed. He is to be killed for his offenses against Buggy, but Zoro and Sanji attempt a daring rescue mission.

episodes.name: The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!
episodes.overview: As a storm batters Logue Town, Buggy, Alvida, and Captain Smoker close in on Luffy for a stirring final showdown!

episodes.name: Precursor to a New Adventure! Apis, a Mysterious Girl!
episodes.overview: The discovery of a small girl adrift in an abandoned life boat interrupts Luffy and his crew's voyage to the Grand Line.

episodes.name: Miraculous Creature! Apis's Secret and the Legendary Island!
episodes.overview: After escaping the clutches of the Marine fleet, the Straw Hats soon find themselves in an equally dangerous predicament - stranded in the Calm Belt!

episodes.name: Eric Attacks! Great Escape from Warship Island!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats want to return Apis's dragon to his nest, but the Marines have them surrounded. Looks like it's time for another daring escape!

episodes.name: A Solitary Island in the Distant Sea! The Legendary Lost Island!
episodes.overview: Even for Nami, finding the dragon's lost island proves to be tougher than looking for a needle in a haystack - or at the bottom of the ocean.

episodes.name: Showdown in the Ruins! Tense Zoro Vs. Eric!
episodes.overview: Nami discovers a map to the true location of the dragon's nest, and Zorro puts his steel to the test against Eric the Whirlwind.

episodes.name: Luffy, Completely Surrounded! Commodore Nelson's Secret Strategy!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats sail headfirst into Commodore Nelson and his Marine armada. While Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro dodge cannon balls, Eric the Whirlwind prepares a sneak attack!

episodes.name: Through the Sky They Soar! The 1000 Year Legend Lives Again!
episodes.overview: With their rescue mission taking on water, the Straw Hats get some surprising help from the great blue yonder.

episodes.name: An Angry Showdown! Cross the Red Line!
episodes.overview: After unlocking the secrets of the dragon's nest, Luffy does battle with Eric the Whirlwind to ensure the safety of the island. Don't mess with the rubberman!

episodes.name: The First Line of Defense? The Giant Whale Laboon Appears!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hat crew takes a wild ride up and down a mountain only to end up in the belly of a giant whale that's on the lookout for pirates!

episodes.name: A Promise Between Men! Luffy and the Whale Vow to Meet Again!
episodes.overview: Luffy trades blows with Laboon the whale, and Nami is distressed to learn that navigating the Grand Line is no easy feat.

episodes.name: A Town That Welcomes Pirates? Setting Foot On Whisky Peak!
episodes.overview: A violent snow storm batters the crew of the Going Merry, but once the Straw Hats arrive at Whisky Peak, the locals invite them to a raucous celebration.

episodes.name: Explosion! The Three Swords Style! Zoro Vs. Baroque Works!
episodes.overview: There are bounty hunters on the prowl, and most of the Straw Hats are dead drunk. Only Zoro is still sober enough to hoist a sword.

episodes.name: All-out Battle! Luffy Vs. Zoro, Mysterious Grand Duel!
episodes.overview: There's a mysterious princess that needs protection from a nose-picking assassin, but Luffy and Zoro are too busy duking it out to worry about explosive boogers.

episodes.name: Deliver Princess Vivi! The Luffy Pirates Set Sail!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats depart Whisky Peak on a mission to return the Princess of Alabasta to her kingdom while protecting her from an army of vicious assassins.

episodes.name: Try Hard, Coby! Coby and Helmeppo's Struggles in the Marines!
episodes.overview: While the crew heads for Little Garden with the princess, Luffy and Zorro's old nemesis, Axe-Hand Morgan, escapes from a Marine prison ship.

episodes.name: Coby and Helmeppo's Resolve! Vice-Admiral Garp's Parental Affection!
episodes.overview: Colby and Helmeppo train day and night to prove they're tough enough to be Marines. A violent showdown with Vice-Admiral Garp will determine if they're worth their salt.

episodes.name: An Ancient Island! The Shadow Hiding in Little Garden!
episodes.overview: Luffy's gang is running low on supplies, so they stop at Little Garden to find something to eat. Unfortunately for them, it might end up the other way around.

episodes.name: Huge Duel! The Giants Dorry and Broggy!
episodes.overview: Not only are there dinosaurs running wild on the island of Little Garden, but the Straw Hats soon find themselves in the middle of a gargantuan grudge match.

episodes.name: Luffy Gets Angry! A Dirty Trick Violates the Sacred Duel!
episodes.overview: Usopp and Luffy are fascinated by the endless battle waged between Dorry and Broggy; however, fascination turns to outrage when Monkey catches a whiff of treachery.

episodes.name: Broggy's Bitter Tears of Victory! The Conclusion of Elbaf!
episodes.overview: Luffy's blood boils for revenge against the assassins who sabotaged Dorry and Broggy's battle, but he's currently trapped between a rock and a hard place.

episodes.name: The Devilish Candle! Tears of Regret and Tears of Anger!
episodes.overview: Mr. 3 creates a large, cake-shaped pedestal to turn Vivi, Nami, and Zoro into wax figures. Karoo, Luffy, and Usopp arrive at the scene just as Zoro attempts to free himself by cutting off his legs.

episodes.name: A Hex on Luffy! Colors Trap!
episodes.overview: While Usopp and Karoo try to out run Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine, Luffy tries to destroy the wax pedestal threatening the lives of his friends.

episodes.name: Time to Fight Back! Usopp's Quick Thinking and Fire Star!
episodes.overview: While Mr. 3, in a in a waxen battle suit, fights Luffy, Usopp and Karoo attempt to bring down the wax pedestal.  Meanwhile, Sanji stumbles upon Mr. 3's hideout, where he receives a call from Mr. 0.

episodes.name: Farewell Giant Island! Head for Alabasta!
episodes.overview: Sanji, pretending to be Mr. 3, convinces Mr. 0 that he has eliminated Vivi and the Straw Hat Pirates. Dorry and Broggy see the Straw Hat Pirates off, and, to thank them, sacrifice their worn out weapons to kill a giant goldfish as it attempts to feed on the Going Merry.

episodes.name: Nami's Sick? Beyond the Snow Falling On The Stars!
episodes.overview: Nami is sick, but the crew doesn't have a doctor to help her.

episodes.name: A Raid! The Tin Tyrant and Tin Plate Wapol!
episodes.overview: While looking for a doctor, the crew meets the pirate Wapol.  Meanwhile Smoker manages to intercept the conversation between Mr. 0 and Sanji and plans to go to Alabasta.

episodes.name: An Island without Doctors? Adventure in a Nameless Land!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hat crew manages to gain the trust of the people that attacked them, and are taken to the village, except for Zoro and Carue, who guard the ship. Luffy and Sanji must take Nami to the island's sole doctor who lives on a mountain-top. Vivi and Usopp discover the past of the island, and about the pirate Wapol from Dalton.

episodes.name: Are You Happy? The Doctor Called Witch!
episodes.overview: While Sanji and Luffy fight off the wilderness, the islander's worst nightmare turns true, as Wapol returns to the island. The doctor is discovered to be on the other side of the island, and Usopp, Vivi and Dalton rush to find her. Dalton however returns as he hears of Wapol's return.

episodes.name: Dalton's Resolve! Wapol's Corps Land on the Island!
episodes.overview: Dalton faces Wapol, but only gets himself hit by arrows thrown by his former comrade Chess. An avalanche stops the battle, but injures Sanji. Luffy must carry both Nami and Sanji to the doctor, and begins his ascent.

episodes.name: The Island Where Snow Lives! Climb the Drum Rockies!
episodes.overview: The Lapahn help Luffy escape from Wapol, giving him enough time to climb to the castle where doctor Kureha lives. Vivi, Usopp and Zoro deal with the king's army in order to save Dalton. The recovering Nami meets a strange creature.

episodes.name: Blue-nosed Reindeer! Chopper's Secret!
episodes.overview: Nami asks Chopper to join the crew, but he isn't interested. Kureha tells Nami some of what was Chopper's background. After realizing the abilities that Chopper has, Luffy is eager to make him join the crew.

episodes.name: An Outcast's Dream! Hiriluk the Quack!
episodes.overview: Doctorine continues to tell how Chopper lived his life and how the quack doctor Hiruluk took care of him.

episodes.name: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms and the Will that Gets Carried On!
episodes.overview: More of Chopper's past is revealed, including the fate of doctor Hiruluk and Wapol's cruelties as the king. Meanwhile, Wapol reaches the castle where the crew is residing.

episodes.name: Fight Wapol's Crew! The Power of the Munch Munch Fruit!
episodes.overview: Wapol is determined to bring down Hiruluk's flag, and to do that, he engages Sanji, Luffy and Chopper in a fight.

episodes.name: Zoan-type Devil Fruit! Chopper's Seven-form Transformation!
episodes.overview: Chopper demonstrates the abilities of Rumble Balls when fighting Chessmarimo. Dalton is uncovered from the avalanche.

episodes.name: When the Kingdom's Rule Ends! The Flag of Faith Flies Forever!
episodes.overview: After trying every trick in the castle, Wapol is finally hunted down by Luffy. The villagers along with Zoro, Vivi and Usopp start their ascent to the castle through a ropeway.

episodes.name: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms! Miracle in the Drum Rockies!
episodes.overview: After finally been convinced to join the team, Chopper announces his intentions to Dr. Kureha, who doesn't take it too well; but after escaping from the castle, she has decided to give the whole Straw Hat crew a farewell gift.

episodes.name: Goodbye Drum Island! I'm Going Out to Sea!
episodes.overview: Chopper joins the Straw Hat crew as they continue their journey to Vivi's homeland.

episodes.name: Alabasta's Hero and a Ballerina on the Ship!
episodes.overview: Crocodile appears to stop rampaging pirates. Luffy and his crew meet Mr. 2 Bon Clay who shows off his devil fruit power and Vivi sees a shocking sight.

episodes.name: Off to the Desert Kingdom! The Rain-Summoning Powder and the Rebel Army!
episodes.overview: Luffy separates from the rest of the crew, right after arriving at Alabasta's port city of Nanohana. The crew dons disguises while Luffy learns of Dance Powder.

episodes.name: The Heroes' Reunion! His Name is Fire Fist Ace!
episodes.overview: While in Nanohana, the Straw Hats encounter Smoker and Tashigi. A powerful pirate named Portgas D. Ace appears, and is revealed to be Luffy's older brother.

episodes.name: Ace and Luffy! Hot Emotions and Brotherly Bonds!
episodes.overview: Ace fights Smoker while the Straw Hats run for their ship. Luffy reunites with his brother, and together take down agents of Baroque Works.

episodes.name: Erumalu, the City of Green and the Kung Fu Dugongs!
episodes.overview: Ace decides to travel with the Straw Hats, as he is hunting for a man known as Blackbeard. The group arrives first at the 'Green City' of Erumalu only to find it abandoned to the desert. Vivi and Nami explain what Dance Powder is and what it has done to Alabasta.

episodes.name: Adventure in the Country of Sand! The Monsters that Live in the Scorching Land!
episodes.overview: After leaving Erumalu, the Straw Hats plus Vivi & Ace continue through the desert, facing the many dangers of it.

episodes.name: Enter the Desert Pirates! The Men Who Live Freely!
episodes.overview: Nami and Vivi found themselves an easier way to travel in the desert and leave all men behind. While trying to catch up with them, Ace gets lost. Luffy and the rest of the gang find the Desert Pirates, and Vivi meets a figure from her past.

episodes.name: False Fortitude! Camu, Rebel Soldier at Heart!
episodes.overview: After hearing that a small village has fake Rebel Army bodyguards that have been keeping peace, Vivi asks the men of the crew to test if they're worthy of staying.

episodes.name: Rebel Warrior Koza! The Dream Vowed to Vivi!
episodes.overview: Still trekking through the Alabasta desert, the crew beats up a giant desert scorpion for lunch, while Vivi tells Nami about her past and her friendship with Kohza.

episodes.name: Showdown in a Heat Haze! Ace vs. the Gallant Scorpion!
episodes.overview: Ace finds out that Blackbeard isn't in Alabasta after all, and leaves the group to continue looking for him. He leaves Luffy a mysterious piece of paper, explaining that it will let them meet again.

episodes.name: Ruins and Lost Ways! Vivi, Her Friends, and the Country's Form!
episodes.overview: Zoro, Chopper and Luffy manage to get themselves lost and stumble across some huge underground ruins.

episodes.name: Spiders Café at 8 o'Clock! The Enemy Leaders Gather!
episodes.overview: Baroque Works plan starts to take effect, and for that, the Number Agents gather to meet Mr. 0. Meanwhile, crew finds out that the Rebel Army has moved out of Yuba and headed to Katorea, and the rebel leader Khoza is determined to attack.

episodes.name: Luffy vs. Vivi! The Tearful Vow to Put Friends on the Line!
episodes.overview: Vivi and Luffy disagree in how to stop the rebel army and Baroque Works, leading to a fight.

episodes.name: The Battlefront of Alabasta! Rainbase, the City of Dreams!
episodes.overview: The crew travels to the city of Rainbase to take down Sir Crocodile and Baroque Works, but run afoul of Smoker and Tashigi.

episodes.name: The Trap of Certain Defeat! Storming Raindinners!
episodes.overview: Most of the Straw Hats, along with Smoker, are trapped by Crocodile. Vivi reunites with the royal guardian Pell, but is captured by Miss All-Sunday. Crocodile reveals his invincible Devil Fruit power.

episodes.name: Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!
episodes.overview: Baroque Works' plan to take over Alabasta is set in motion. The king is kidnapped and framed for a crime, and the rebel army begins to move.

episodes.name: The Terrifying Banana Gators and Mr. Prince!
episodes.overview: Most of the Straw Hats are helplessly trapped, but Crocodile is contacted by "Mr. Prince".

episodes.name: The Key to a Great Comeback Escape! The Wax-Wax Ball!
episodes.overview: Chopper distracts Crocodile while Sanji frees the rest of the crew, but find themselves trapped yet again. Smoker's view on Luffy changes a little.

episodes.name: Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs Crocodile!
episodes.overview: After escaping from Rain Dinners, the Straw Hats and Vivi cross the desert to Alubarne, where the final battle will take place. Crocodile, however, manages to catch Luffy, beginning the first round of their battle.

episodes.name: Dash For a Miracle! Alabasta Animal Land!
episodes.overview: Luffy is left for dead by Crocodile, but is helped by the mysterious Miss All-Sunday. The rest of the Straw Hats reach Alubarna.

episodes.name: Rebel Army vs. Royal Army! Showdown at Alubarna!
episodes.overview: The revolution is on the verge of starting and the crew comes out with a plan that could stop it.

episodes.name: Alubarna Grieves! The Fierce Captain Karoo!
episodes.overview: Vivi's attempts to stop the rebel army go to waste, and she is attacked by Mr. 2 Bon Clay, but manages to escape. Meanwhile, the battle of Usopp and Chopper vs. the Mr. 4 team begins.

episodes.name: Sworn on a Friend's Dream! The Battle of Molehill, Block 4!
episodes.overview: Things look hopeless for Usopp & Chopper as they continue to suffer from every attack that the Mr.4 team makes. However, the tides may be beginning to turn as Usopp learns what it truly means to be a man.

episodes.name: Big Opening Day Today! The Copy-Copy Montage!
episodes.overview: Albeit severely beaten and bruised, Usopp and Chopper have finally defeated the Mr.4 team. However, Mr. 2 has figured out Sanji's weakness.

episodes.name: Transformed into Nami! Bon Clay's Rapid-Fire Ballet Kenpo!
episodes.overview: Though Mr. 2 discovers Sanji's weakness, Sanji still defeats his opponent after an evenly-matched fight. Meanwhile, before Vivi could give the word to blow up the palace, Crocodile appears.

episodes.name: Nami's Cyclone Advisory! Clima Tact Burst!
episodes.overview: Nami faces off against Miss Doublefinger and tries to figure out her new weapon, the Klima Takt (Climate Baton), at the same time.

episodes.name: Secret Passed Down In The Royal Family! The Ancient Weapon Pluton!
episodes.overview: While Crocodile reveals to Vivi about the ancient weapon Pluton, Nami attempts to defeat Miss Doublefinger with her most powerful attack: The Tornado Tempo.

episodes.name: Secret Of Powerful Swordplay! Ability To Cut Steel And The Rhythm Things Have!
episodes.overview: While Miss. Doublefinger's fight with Nami was challenging, Zoro is having an even more difficult time fighting Mr.1: A man who can change his entire body into steel - something that Zoro can't cut. As Zoro nears death, he must discover the secret to "the breath of all things".

episodes.name: The Battle is Over! Koza Raises the White Flag!
episodes.overview: When Vivi reveals Crocodile's plan to Kohza, he attempts to stop the fighting, but is shot. Crocodile reveals that he has set up a massive bomb in the city.

episodes.name: Where Vivi's Voice Gets Heard! The Hero Descends!
episodes.overview: As Kohza tries to stop the Rebel Army, both sides are once more fighting due to the intervention of Baroque Works. Vivi is thrown to her certain death when Luffy saves her and challenges Crocodile to a second round.

episodes.name: Sand Croc and Water Luffy! The Second Round of the Duel!
episodes.overview: Luffy fights Crocodile with more success this time by using water, but still loses this round. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats hurry to locate the bomb before it goes off. Nico Robin forces the king to take her to the tomb where the Pluton Poneglyph is hidden.

episodes.name: That Looks Croc-ish! Luffy, Run to the Royal Tomb!
episodes.overview: Crocodile joins Robin in the tomb, and orders her to translate the Poneglyph. Robin tells him that Pluton was not mentioned and that it was only about history, but Crocodile figures out that she was lying and stabs her in response. When Luffy recovers from the last round of fighting, he chases after Crocodile into the tomb.

episodes.name: The Nightmare Draws Near! This is the Sand-Sand Clan's Secret Base!
episodes.overview: Luffy fights with Crocodile by using blood on his fists. Meanwhile Vivi finds the bomb, and calls the Straw Hats together.

episodes.name: Magnificent Wings! My Name is Pell, Guardian Deity of the Country!
episodes.overview: Vivi finds the bomb inside of the clock tower, but the Mr. 7 pair of Baroque Works are there to protect it. Vivi defeats them, but she realizes the bomb cannot be stopped so easily. It has a timer, and right before it blows up, Pell shows up and takes it into the atmosphere, where he sacrifices himself to save Alabasta.

episodes.name: I Will Surpass You! Rain Falls in Alabasta!
episodes.overview: Luffy defeats Crocodile by punching him through solid bedrock. When Crocodile falls, the rain-drops calm the soldiers.

episodes.name: A Farewell to Arms! Pirates and Different Ideas of Justice!
episodes.overview: Now that the battle has ended, the outcome is tallied. Igaram appears with proof of Cobra's innocence, as well as Kohza telling everything. Tashigi and Smoker both are rewarded for taking on Crocodile, but neither one of them believes that is right, considering the Straw Hat pirates did all the work.

episodes.name: The Pirates' Banquet And Operation Escape From Alabasta!
episodes.overview: Luffy is rescued from the collapsed tomb where he fought Crocodile and brought into Cobra's palace to rest. When he awakens, a magnificent banquet is thrown for the pirates, then, the Straw Hats are invited to enjoy the hot spring steam room inside the palace.

episodes.name: It All Started On That Day! Vivi Tells The Story Of Her Adventure!
episodes.overview: It's the day for Vivi's speech and her decision whether or not to continue to be with the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Bon Clay and his crew attempt to protect the Straw Hats from Hina.

episodes.name: Scent of Danger! The Seventh Member is Nico Robin!
episodes.overview: The Marines fail again to catch the Straw Hats. After escaping from the Marines, Nico Robin (Ms. All Sunday) appears from inside of the Straw Hats ship. She manages to persuade the crew to let her join. Pell is seen at the end standing over his own grave.

episodes.name: The First Patient! The Untold Story Of The Rumble Ball!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats land on an uninhabited island; Sanji immediately notices that it is covered with fruit-bearing trees. The crew decides to divide the work by drawing straws. Luffy, Zoro, and Usopp are sent to gather the fruit while Nami and Sanji survey the island. Chopper is left to guard the ship. He enjoys himself but suddenly realizes that Robin is nearby and flees into the cabin. He works on producing Rumble Balls and talks to himself about his mentor, Dr. Kureha, but notices that Robin is listening to him and breaks a barrel of water in surprise. Robin accompanies Chopper as he goes to replace the spilled liquid and he tells Robin about Dr. Kureha and how she became his first patient.

episodes.name: Uprising of the Navigator! For the Unyielding Dream!
episodes.overview: While fishing with Chopper and Usopp, Luffy fishes an ammonite-shaped vehicle out of the sea. The pirates debate if it is edible, but to their surprise, its side opens and a traveling salesman emerges. He offers them obscure items and tries to sell a pile of paper to Nami. However, before he can settle the deal, the salesman realizes that he is on a pirate ship and flees in panic, abandoning his merchandise. With the paper, Nami can finally begin drawing the map of the world that she has dreamed about making since her childhood. However, because the rest of the crew is causing mischief, she has trouble completing her work and has to restart twice before finishing her map of Reverse Mountain.

episodes.name: A Recipe Handed Down! Sanji, the Iron Man of Curry!
episodes.overview: In a thick bank of fog, the Straw Hats run into a fleet of navy ships. Surprised by the sight of the skull and crossbones on the pirate ship's sails, the young trainee cook Tajiyo falls off of his navy vessel. Robin catches him before he hits the water and the boy regains consciousness in the Straw Hats' cabin. Scared at first, he loosens up when presented by Sanji with a soup of surprising quality. The small cook reveals his problem: he spilled the day's production of curry and has been charged with replacing it. To compound the issue, the fleet's captains plan to dine aboard his ship. Luffy and Sanji take Tajiyo back to his ship, where Sanji provides him with subtle cooking advice. Tajiyo's new curry turns out perfectly and the Straw Hats escape before the fog lifts in the mid-day sun.

episodes.name: I Will Make It Bloom! Usopp The Man And The Eight-Foot Shell!
episodes.overview: Because it is raining, Luffy reads out of boredom. Fortunately for him, the Straw Hats' ship reaches the next island. Walking through its port town, they learn that the island known for its yearly fireworks show, which was to occur that day. The fireworks factory, run by an old man named Odama and his granddaughter Kodama, is on a hill outside the town. Usopp goes there, hoping for an opportunity to buy gunpowder. At the factory, he helps Odama and Kodama prepare for the show. Usopp learns that Kodama plans to secretly fire the second of two eight-shaku-tall firework balls to fulfill her parents' dream. Her parents died the previous year after the first misfired, and Usopp convinces Kodama that it is too dangerous for her to fire it. Usopp uses a tall, ancient building to safely launch the large firework ball.

episodes.name: The Fabled Pirate Hunter! Zoro, The Wandering Swordsman!
episodes.overview: Before he meets Luffy, Zoro traveled the world in search of "Hawk-Eye" Mihawk. In a flashback, Zoro captures the target of the bounty hunters Johnny and Yosaku in a bar. According to bounty hunter rules, they demand that he relinquish the victim's body to them. Zoro, who does not consider himself a bounty hunter, complies, explaining that he only brings in a bounty from time to time so that he can survive until he can become the greatest swordsman in the world. Later that day, a group of bandits, led by a man with a much higher bounty, plunders the village. Johnny and Yosaku, inspired by Zoro's conviction, decide to take on the villain, but are quickly defeated. As the bandits prepare to kill the pair, Zoro returns and saves Johnny and Yosaku. After he defeats the bandits and their leader, Johnny and Yosaku become his followers.

episodes.name: Zenny Of The Island Of Goats And The Pirate Ship In The Mountains!
episodes.overview: A few navy ships chase the Straw Hats. To escape them, the Straw Hats sail through an area of wild currents, which surround an island that is only inhabited by an old man named Zenii and his goats. Zenii realizes that the Straw Hats are pirates and sends his goats to attack them. During the fight Zenii's heart stops from fear. The Straw Hats take him to his home, nurse him back to health, and complete his chores, such as cleaning his house, preparing meals, and chopping wood. Zoro searches for food and discovers a small nearly completed pirate ship atop the island's mountain. At the day's end, as the crew is about to leave, Chopper reveals that the old man will die within three days. Driven by guilt, the Straw Hats decide to stay with him until then.

episodes.name: How's Tricks? The Designs of Zenny the Moneylender!
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats continue to do Zenii's daily work and finish building his pirate ship, which he intends to use as a coffin. Zoro eventually realizes that the three days until Zenii's death, which Chopper had diagnosed, have long passed, but by the time he convinces the others to leave, Nami has already lost the Straw Hats' ship in a game of chess. Robin wins it back and they all have a party. As Zenii becomes drunk, he recollects his past as a moneylender who lent money to pirates. He describes how he was shipwrecked twenty years earlier, and that he, in hopes of one day becoming a pirate, started building a ship. As the years passed, he became too old for a pirate's life. Luffy disagrees, saying that pirates can be of any age. The next day, a group of marines lures the Straw Hats into a trap. To save them, Zenii and his goats ride his ship down the mountainside.

episodes.name: Whereabouts of the Island Treasure! Attack of the Zenny Pirates!
episodes.overview: The commotion caused by Zenii's arrival allows Nami, Sanji, Usopp, and Chopper to board their ship safely. Zenii and his goats get on the navy ship and Zenii uses of his martial arts skills, with a counting frame to fight. Luffy attempts to slingshot himself over to help him, but lands in the water instead. Zoro immediately jumps in after him to rescue the non-swimmer, only to be run over by the Straw Hats' own ship. The marines are eventually defeated, but a fleet of nine more ships is still waiting in the fog surrounding the island. Zenii tells the Straw Hats that, on his arrival on the island, the goats ate all of his money and that they became his treasure instead. The Straw Hats give Zenii enough medicine to survive and leave the island, escaping from the navy.

episodes.name: Legend Of The Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo Of Luluka Island!
episodes.overview: After escaping from another fleet of navy ships, the Straw Hats drop anchor outside a town with a huge tower. After they set foot on land, an official demands that they pay a harbor tax. The Straw Hats meet a scientist named Henzo, who asks them if they have seen what he calls the "Rainbow Mist." The other citizens of the town dislike Henzo because they have to pay high taxes to fund for his research. While shopping with Nami and Chopper, Sanji has a violent encounter with a tax collector, who is wearing an electric battle suit. A large, unmanned galley appears in the harbor, in the same condition that Henzo saw it fifty years ago. Henzo, Luffy, Robin, and Usopp aboard it. Further out at sea, a rainbow-colored mist appears and the group uses the Straw Hats' ship to enter it.

episodes.name: Residents of the Land of Eternity! The Pumpkin Pirates!
episodes.overview: Inside the mist, Luffy and his group discover a large ship graveyard. Luffy salvages a chest filled with gold and jewels from one of the shipwrecks, but a distant voice tells him to return the treasure and leave the mist. Usopp believes the voices to be ghosts, but they actually originate from a group of children who call themselves the Pumpkin Pirates. In his youth, Henzo was a member of this group, and they are the reason for his research. He spent his life in search of a means to rescue them from the Rainbow Mist. Only a short time earlier from their point of view, but fifty years earlier from Henzo's perspective, a group of pirates, led by a Captain Whetton, attacked the children's town. When Whetton came after the children, they tried to escape by stealing the pirates' ship. During the fight, Whetton smashed the ship's helm, and Henzo jumped overboard, taking Whetton with him, while the other children sailed into the mist.

episodes.name: Thoughts of Home! The Pirate Graveyard of No Escape!
episodes.overview: After entering the Rainbow Mist, the children followed the orders of Ian, the only pirate left on the ship. He mistreated them and they eventually locked him up in the brig of the wreck of a navy ship. Luffy and his group try to escape the mist, but they soon realize that they need help. The Straw Hats persuade one of the children to lead them to the Pumpkin Pirates' hiding place so they can ask them for a way out. Usopp prepares a steaming meal, which causes most of the children to like the Straw Hats; however, their leader, Lapanui, remains suspicious and unwilling to help. Henzo's snail-o-phone rings and the son of Whetton wants Henzo to investigate the mist, not knowing that the professor is already inside the mist. When Lapanui hears Whetton's name, he loses what little he trust has for Henzo.

episodes.name: An Inevitable Melee! Wetton's Schemes and the Rainbow Tower!
episodes.overview: Lapanui accuses Henzo of being Whetton's lapdog and says that in the past, Henzo would have never allowed that to happen. Usopp tells Lapanui that Henzo had endured the same insults from the townspeople yet still tried to rescue the children. Then, for no apparent reason, Luffy slingshots himself and Lapanui to another part of the mist. At the harbor, Nami ties a long lifeline, prepared by Henzo, to a boat and enters the Rainbow Mist. Once inside, Ian, who convinced one of the children to release him, steals the boat and escapes. He reaches Whetton and describes to him the mist's treasures. Whetton orders his men to invade the mist. The town's large tower falls into the water, creating a bridge from the island into the mist, and Whetton and his men cross it to attack.

episodes.name: And So, the Legend Begins! To the Other Side of the Rainbow!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Lapanui are outside the mist and use the newly created bridge to re-enter it. There, Luffy fights Whetton and, as it becomes clear that he cannot defeat Luffy face-to-face, Whetton detonates the tower, trapping everyone else inside and Whetton's abandoned men join forces with Luffy's group. An exit appears in the distance and they row toward it, but it closes too fast for them to reach it. Hoping to generate enough wind to blow the Straw Hats' ship clear of the mist, Lapanui stays behind to destroy the navy ship's armory. The other children follow him, promising to meet Henzo again. The explosion they cause successfully blows the Straw Hats' ship outside the mist. There, a group of navy ships, led by an aged Lapanui, arrives and confiscates the Rainbow Mist's treasures from Whetton and takes him and his men into custody.

episodes.name: The Log is Taken! Salvage King, Masira!
episodes.overview: Nami's log pose begins to point to the sky, after that, a big ship falls from sky and the crew finds a map in of an island named 'Skypiea' on a 200-year-old ship. They compete with the monkey-like Masira's salvage crew while they search for more clues on how to get there.

episodes.name: Monsters Appear! Don't Touch the Whitebeard Pirates
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats decide to go to Jaya island to look for information on Skypeia. Meanwhile, Ace suddenly shows up on Buggy's ship; Buggy doesn't let any of his men attack Ace, fearing Whitebeard's retribution.

episodes.name: Stop Dreaming! The City of Ridicule, Mock Town!
episodes.overview: Jaya's main town is full of famous pirates that are constantly brawling with each other. Luffy and Zoro have a run-in with a pirate known as 'Bellamy the Hyena,' who ridicules their dreams and beats them up.

episodes.name: A Pirate's Height! The Man who Talks of Dreams and the King of Underwater Exploration
episodes.overview: Following a fight in the bar, Luffy, Zoro and Nami meet a man outside the bar who tells them that Sky Island does exist. As they leave Mock Town, they get into a fight with Masira's brother Shōjo, another salvage monkey.

episodes.name: The Legendary Family! 'Liar Norland'
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats meet with Montblanc Cricket on another part of Jaya; Cricket is a descendant of Montblanc Noland, an infamous "liar" who told of a gold city on Jaya, and Cricket was outcasted for looking for artifacts of the gold city. He may be the only person who knows how to get to Skypiea.

episodes.name: Hard Turn to the Clouds! Find the Southbird!
episodes.overview: Cricket explains how the Straw Hats can ride a dangerous vertical current called the Knock-Up Stream to get to Skypeia. However, they first have to catch a southbird to point them toward the point where the stream will erupt from the ocean.

episodes.name: Dreams Don't Come True!? Bellamy vs. The Saruyama Alliance
episodes.overview: While the Straw Hats are looking for a Southbird, Bellamy and his crew attack Cricket's house, and steal the gold artifacts he'd collected over the years from his salvage work. When the Straw Hats return and see what happened, Luffy decides to take a side trip back to Mock Town.

episodes.name: The 100 Million Man! The World's Greatest Authority and the Pirate Blackbeard
episodes.overview: Luffy takes out Bellamy with a single punch. Meanwhile, the world government heads are concerned over Whitebeard, Shanks, and Luffy. The marines try to decide who will replace Crocodile as a Shichibukai - one of Blackbeard's crew shows up uninvited and nominates his captain.

episodes.name: Sail into the Sky! Ride the Knock-Up Stream
episodes.overview: The Going Merry is refitted by Masira and Shōjo to be more flight capable, and the Straw Hats catch a ride on the Knock-Up Stream for Skypeia.

episodes.name: This is the Sea of the Sky! The Knight of the Sky and Heaven's Gate
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats arrive in an ocean above the clouds. Usopp almost falls out of the Going Merry but is saved at the last minute. The crew is also attacked by a mysterious looking warrior, but is saved by the Knight of the Sky. Finally, they arrive at the border which transports them to the upper realm, Skypiea.

episodes.name: Godland Skypiea! The Angels Of the Cloud Beach
episodes.overview: As the crew arrives in Skypiea, they're greeted by Conis and her pet, Suu. Both she and her father start explaining how the life in Skypiea is and how the different Dials work.

episodes.name: Forbidden Sacred Ground! The Island Where God Resides and Heaven's Judgement!
episodes.overview: Nami finds out what should happen to anyone who enters the forest. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang are waiting for the wind to change but are rudely assaulted by Skypiea's police who are going to carry out Heaven's Judgement.

episodes.name: Criminals Already!? Skypiea's Upholders of the Law
episodes.overview: The Straw Hats have some problems with the local justice enforcer force called "The White Berets."

episodes.name: Can we Escape!? God's Ordeals are Set in Motion!
episodes.overview: Before they can leave Chopper, Robin, Nami and Zorro are abducted by a giant shrimp. Luffy, Sanji and Usoppe go after them to the upper yard

episodes.name: Trap on Lovely Street! Almighty God Enel
episodes.overview: Conis leads Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji to a boat to get to Upper Yard, but she tells them it is a trap and almost gets hit by "Heaven's Judgment".

episodes.name: Go Forth, Little Crow! To the Sacrificial Altar
episodes.overview: Luffy, Usopp and Sanji finally enter Upper Yard, only to find out that the whole road is trapped heavily, but at last they arrive at the Ordeal Gates. Meanwhile Robin, Zoro, and Nami go out to explore Upper Yard while Chopper stays behind to guard the ship.

episodes.name: Survival Rate: 10%! Priest Satori with the Power of Mantra!
episodes.overview: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp enter the Ordeal of Balls gate and encounter the Priest Satori.

episodes.name: Peril of the Ordeal of Balls! Fight to the Death in the Lost Forest
episodes.overview: Usopp, Sanji and Luffy fight Satori, but the power of Mantra seems to be too strong.

episodes.name: Chopper's in Danger! Former God vs. Shinto priest Shura
episodes.overview: Chopper, threatened by priest Shura, blows the whistle for Gan Fall to come, but before he can arrive, Priest Shura assaults Chopper and begins destroying the Going Merry.

episodes.name: Ever Mysterious! Ordeal of String and Ordeal of Love!?
episodes.overview: Satori is defeated by Luffy and Sanji. Mainwhile has Gan Fall been defeated and Chopper jumps in the water to rescue him.

episodes.name: Light the Fire of Shandia! Wiper the Warrior
episodes.overview: Chopper is saved by a bunch of giant Southbirds, who tell him that Gan Fall was actually God. Nami, Zoro and Robin discover the reason why Upper Yard is a soil island: It was once part of Jaya, and this is the part that Liar Norland saw. Meanwhile the Shandians attack Upper Yard.

episodes.name: Floating Land of Gold, Jaya! To God's Shrine!
episodes.overview: The Shandians' attack on Upper Yard has started. The crew is finally reunited, and everyone speaks up about what has happened. Chopper takes care of Gan Fall, and the pirates plan to steal the gold on the island.

episodes.name: Eve of Gold Festival! Feelings Toward 'Vearth'!
episodes.overview: After befriending a wolf pack, Gan Fall tells the crew a little more about the history of Upper Yard.

episodes.name: God Enel Appears! Aubade to the Survivors
episodes.overview: Eneru takes away the limitations of the priests. Also, Usopp witnesses a mysterious person fixing the ship; the next day Merry is found to be back to her original form. After getting her off the altar, the pirates plan out their course of action.

episodes.name: The Python Strikes! The Survival Game Begins
episodes.overview: A giant python makes Luffy, Robin, Chopper and Zoro split while going to the ruins at the south.

episodes.name: The Life-Threatening Reject! War Demon Wiper's Resolve
episodes.overview: Wyper takes out Shura and tells his goal to the Shandians, and Eneru speaks up about how many people will be alive by the end of his plan.

episodes.name: Fierce Sky Battle! Pirate Zoro vs. Fighter Braham
episodes.overview: Zoro fights the Shandian warrior Braham, and defeats him with One Sword Style: 36 Caliber Phoenix technique.

episodes.name: Howling Burn Bazooka!! Pirate Luffy vs. Wiper the Berserker
episodes.overview: Luffy fights Wyper, but after some time, he falls into some underground ruins. Meanwhile, Eneru appears on the Going Merry and after telling that his true goal was the City of Gold, he takes out both Usopp and Sanji; then he vanishes and leaves Satori's brothers: Hotori and Kotori to avenge him.

episodes.name: Ordeal of Swamp! Pirate Chopper vs Gedatsu!!
episodes.overview: Chopper is attacked by Gedatsu, who turns out to be a complete moron, and eventually defeats him, sending him plummeting to the Blue Sea. Conis and Pagaya help Aisa, and head to Upper Yard.

episodes.name: The Invincible Ability! Enel's True Nature Revealed
episodes.overview: Eneru defeats several members of the Shandian Tribe. Meanwhile, Gan Fall and Nami start and finish their fight with Kotori and Hotori. Hotori is defeated by Nami while Kotori is defeated by Gan Fall.

episodes.name: The Vanished City! The Magnificent Ruins of Shandora!!
episodes.overview: While Robin is looking at some ruins she found, Yama, The Chief Enforcer, attacks her. Yama is easily defeated by Robin. Later, she discovers the legendary city, Shandora.

episodes.name: Chance of Survival: 0%!! Pirate Chopper vs. Shinto Priest Ohm
episodes.overview: Priest Ohm appears and starts fighting everyone.

episodes.name: Climb Giant Jack!! Showdown in the Upper Ruins
episodes.overview: At the Upper Ruins, the fight between Ohm, Zoro, Gan Fall and Wyper begins. When Nami appears, she is swallowed by the giant python, along with Gan Fall and Aisa.

episodes.name: Ultimate Test of the Ordeal of Iron! The White-Barbed Death Match!!
episodes.overview: Ohm makes matters worse, creating a barbed wire cage around the area. Laki is knocked out by Eneru, and Nami, Aisa, and Gan Fall find out why the python was rampaging so much.

episodes.name: Gushing Blade Attack! Pirate Zoro vs Shinto Priest Ohm!!
episodes.overview: Zoro finally defeats Priest Ohm with his 108 Caliber Phoenix technique. Meanwhile Pagaya and Conis hear the terrible truth about the goal of Eneru: to eradicate every person in the sky.

episodes.name: The Upper Ruins Crumble! The Quintet Finale!!
episodes.overview: Eneru appears only to reduce the group as close to his prediction as he can.

episodes.name: Battle in the Ancient Ruins! God Enel's Desire!!
episodes.overview: Eneru counterattacks Gan Fall and lands a finishing hit. He then knocks out Robin as she tries to manipulate him. Zoro impresses Eneru with his power but is easily beaten, while trying to make him pay for what he did to Robin; but it takes Wyper with a secret weapon to take Eneru down.

episodes.name: Ambitions of Fairy Vearth - The Ark, Maxim!!
episodes.overview: Eneru defeats Zoro and Wyper. Upon seeing this, Nami follows him to a cave where his ark, Maxim, is. Luffy finally gets out of the snake, along with Aisa, only to find out the outcome of the fight against Eneru. When Aisa tells him that she knows where he is, he asks her to take him there.

episodes.name: Finally Clashing! Pirate Luffy vs God Enel!!
episodes.overview: Luffy and Eneru start fighting. Conis tells the dangers of staying in Sky Island to the other Skypieans.

episodes.name: Maxim Rises! The Start of Deathpiea!!
episodes.overview: Eneru starts a machine that would bring the death of Sky Island: Deathpiea.

episodes.name: Luffy's Fall! God's Judgement and Nami's Desire!!
episodes.overview: Luffy falls from the ark. Nami starts fighting Eneru while Sanji and Usopp try to rescue her.

episodes.name: Two People Awaken! A Rescue in Front of Burning Love!!
episodes.overview: Usopp and Sanji split up to rescue Nami, but the first one to get on deck is Usopp.

episodes.name: Capriccio to Destruction! The Impending Doom of Sky Island!!
episodes.overview: Eneru's thunderclouds are coming down to Sky Island while the evacuation is half complete.

episodes.name: Guidance from the Sound of a Bell! The Great Warrior and Tales of an Explorer
episodes.overview: The history of Norland and Calgara is told, as a flashback from Wyper.

episodes.name: Released from Disgrace! The Tears of the Great Warrior!!
episodes.overview: Norland and Calgara are enjoying themselves, as well as the villagers and Norland's crew, but that changes one day, as the villagers start hating their new friends.

episodes.name: Eternal Friendship! The Bell of Oath Echoes Throughout the Giant Ocean!!
